channel.title: [pi] Need Help With Web Client
channel.description:
I Know I Am Going To Sound Rather Stupid Here But I Have Followed Some TuTs OnHow To Make A Web Client With No Luck So If Any One Could Help Me Please Ither Pm Me Or Add Me On Skype Aaran.perry
King Regards, Aaran

item.title: [pi] Need Help With Web Client
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

They need to reply so people can correct any mistakes and work together to solve it. That would be a lot better. So I’m not PMing I’m replying. What I would do is download a webclient ready project insanity base. then i would look up a video on how to use JAR Maker on rsps. after you make the .jar add this to your website for the game:

a

replace client.jar with the direct download link of your servers client.jar. if you have any other problems you should start a new thread because they will be about something else. I would use [PI] Lost Legacy the only problem with that server is that you will have to manually download the cache and put it in your c drive folder bc if u dont it doesnt download right from the client for some reason im still trying to fix that.

If you need the code for the whole page heres something I just html coded for you:

[code]

YourServerNameHere Welcome to the official website of YourServerNameHere. The owner is: OwnerNameHere. Play the webclient below. If there are any problems report them to this email: YourEmail. Thanks for choosing YourServerNameHere. Enjoy! Clickhereto download the client.
There might be an error box with no game background that says: "Error Connecting, Please report.". If that happens then download this and put it in the C drive folder in My Computer/Computer. [/code]

if you want to make that into your website you can use webs.com with html file hosting mode. make sure you name it index.html when you save the page there.

Read full topic
